title: UK’s military procurement system comes under fire from MPs
description: Parliamentary report highlights failings two days before Ministry of Defence is due to publish its latest strategy

title: Republican party’s divisions over Ukraine on show at testy Iowa summit
description: Former vice-president Mike Pence was booed on stage when he argued for continued US military aid for Kyiv

title: Defence secretary Ben Wallace to quit Westminster
description: Long-serving former army captain had been touted as future Tory leader

title: New US shutdown risk looms as culture wars hit defence budget
description: Republicans add measures against abortion, diversity and transgender rights to spending bill

title: Clouds gather over support for Ukraine
description: Politicians and public opinion in parts of central and eastern Europe have doubts about Volodymyr Zelenskyy and the war

title: Ukraine is currently doing Nato’s job for it
description: Kyiv remaining stuck in the waiting room is a green light for Putin to attack again

title: Climate graphic of the week: Global warming is supercharging weather events, say scientists
description: Flooding in US, India and Japan while extreme heat is forecast in Europe raises concerns about pace of change

title: Postcard from Lyttelton: the one-man restaurant in New Zealand’s hipster harbour
description: At Mapu, Giulio Sturla cooks dazzling dishes for just six guests  — and is the waiter, wine-buyer and washer-upper too
